casebody.data:
MULTIPLE CLAIMANTS
v.
NCDHHS. No. 183A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 16, 2006. Robert G. Hargett, Amar Majmundar, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, for NCDHHS. Benjamin E. Baker, Jr., Montgomery, AL, Bruce A. Elmore, Jr., Asheville, C. Gary Triggs, Robert K. Denton, Lawrence D. McMahon, Jr., Morganton, William Hixson, Henry E. Teich, Scott M. Anderson, Greenville, SC, for Multiple Claimants.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of October 2006 by Defendant for Leave to File Reply Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of October 2006."
